title: Jina Web Reader
overviewMarkdown: This plugin fetches web pages via Jina

openaiSpec.name: jina_web_reader

url.description: The URL of the webpage to read

includeImages.description: Whether to include images in the response

openaiSpec.description: Fetch the entire content of a web page Jina.ai's web reader with options for images

userSettings.name: jinaApiKey
userSettings.label: Jina API Key
userSettings.description: Your API key for accessing Jina.ai services
